abstract: Marcus Trappaud Bjorn, journalism student and freelance photographer from Copenhagen, spent 10 weeks in 2014 riding Staten Island Ferry and photographing its wide diversity of passengers.
lead_paragraph: Marcus Trappaud Bjorn, a freelance photographer from Copenhagen, created an award-winning series of portraits of passengers taking the Staten Island Ferry.
snippet: Marcus Trappaud Bjorn, a freelance photographer from Copenhagen, created an award-winning series of portraits of passengers taking the Staten Island Ferry.
